data.comment: The match has started.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards the home team a throw-in.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Gil Vicente.
In the minute 7, In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Moreirense.
Throw-in Moreirense.
In the minute 10, Free kick Gil Vicente.
Free kick in a good position for Gil Vicente!
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
In the minute 13, Throw-in Moreirense.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 14, Ibrahima Camara (Moreirense) has received a yellow card from Miguel Bertolo Nogueira.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 16, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 17, Renan Oliveira (Gil Vicente) has received a first yellow card.
Felipe Pires is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Moreirense's Felipe Pires is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 20, Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
In Moreira de Conegos, Moreirense push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 22, Joao Afonso (Gil Vicente) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards Moreirense a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
At Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas, Moreirense are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 27, Ball safe as Gil Vicente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
In the minute 32, Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Moreirense.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
Andre Luis of Moreirense smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Moreirense.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Free kick Gil Vicente.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Gil Vicente.
Moreirense's Felipe Pires is on target but unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moreira de Conegos.
In the minute 45, Can Moreirense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gil Vicente's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The first-half is over at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Moreirense.
In the minute 46, Goncalo Franco is on a sub for Ibrahima Camara for Moreirense.
Moreirense have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 48, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards the home team a throw-in.
Gil Vicente are whistled for offside.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in Moreirense.
Antoine Leautey is replacing Renan Oliveira for the away team.
Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Moreirense.
In the minute 55, Anthony D`Alberto (Moreirense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Gil Vicente are pushing forward but Lourency's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Free kick Moreirense.
Lazar Rosic is booked for the home team.
In the minute 58, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards the home team a throw-in.
Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 59, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a throw-in for Gil Vicente, close to Moreirense's area.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Miguel Bertolo Nogueira.
In the minute 61, Gil Vicente are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ruben Fernandes scores to make it 0-1 at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
In the minute 65, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Cesar Peixoto is making the team's second substitution at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas with Yan replacing David Tavares.
Derik Lacerda is replacing Andre Luis for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Cesar Peixoto (Moreirense) is making a fourth substitution, with Walterson replacing Afonso Figueiredo.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Moreirense's half.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moreira de Conegos.
Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Gil Vicente.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards Gil Vicente a goal kick.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Throw-in Gil Vicente.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 77, The home team replace Felipe Pires with Galego.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
The away team have replaced Samuel Dias Lino with Miullen. This is the second substitution made today by Ricardo Soares.
In the minute 79, Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Moreirense.
Own goal! Denis has scored at the wrong end to make it 1-1.
In the minute 81, Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards the home team a throw-in.
Moreirense advance rapidly upfield but Miguel Bertolo Nogueira blows for offside.
In the minute 83, Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards the home team a throw-in.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
Moreirense to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
In the minute 84, Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
Goncalo Franco for Moreirense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
In the minute 88, Gil Vicente's Antoine Leautey gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moreira de Conegos.
In the minute 89, The away team have replaced Claude Goncalves with Vitor Carvalho. This is the third substitution made today by Ricardo Soares.
Moreirense needs to be cautious. Gil Vicente have an attacking throw-in.
Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Gil Vicente.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Throw-in for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Ruben Fernandes is back on the pitch.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Gil Vicente.
Miguel Bertolo Nogueira blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
